Musical Instruments.name: Timeless Tunes & Instruments
Musical Instruments.description: Delve into the world of classical music and iconic instruments with this quiz. Test your knowledge of composers, instruments, and musical history. From Tiny Tim to Beethoven, prepare to be challenged!

questions.text: Pop icon Tiny Tim was famous for playing what musical instrument?
questions.hint: This small stringed instrument is often associated with Hawaiian music.

questions.text: Who composed the 'Moonlight Sonata'?
questions.hint: This composer, known for his deafness, wrote this famous piano piece.

questions.text: How many keys are on a standard piano?
questions.hint: This number corresponds to the full range of musical notes across several octaves.

questions.text: What is a balalaika?
questions.hint: This stringed instrument is iconic in Russian folk music.

questions.text: The Strauss family of composers popularized what dance?
questions.hint: This elegant dance is often performed in 3/4 time at grand balls.

Musical Instruments.name: Groove & Gear: A Modern Instrument Quiz
Musical Instruments.description: Explore the sounds of modern music and the instruments that create them. This quiz focuses on effects pedals, time signatures, and the unique sounds of contemporary music. Get ready to rock!

questions.text: With what would you use a wah-wah pedal?
questions.hint: This device alters the sound of a stringed instrument, popular in rock and funk.

questions.text: Pop icon Tiny Tim was famous for playing what musical instrument?
questions.hint: This small stringed instrument is often associated with Hawaiian music.

questions.text: If a piece of music is in 'common time' how many quarter notes are there per measure?
questions.hint: Common time is often represented by a 4/4 time signature.
